mapper.insert: insert into tb_teacher(userid, atgrade, classname, username, userpw, userphone, useraddr, useremail, usertype) values (#{userId}, #{atGrade}, #{className}, #{userName}, #{userPw}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userType})
